headline: Politically Georgia: Why Rivian has charged up the race for governor
author: Patricia Murphy
sentences: Plus, our team also discusses how key items of U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnocks agenda made it into the State of the Union and why Herschel Walker will not be joining U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene on the campaign trail this weekend.
In this edition of the Politically Georgia podcast, hosts Greg Bluestein and Patricia Murphy dig into how Perdue is leading the charge to stop Gov.
The $5 billion Rivian electric vehicle plant will be the largest economic development project in Georgia history.
Listen and subscribe to our podcast for free at Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts, or Stitcher.

So why is David Perdue against it?
